Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this exceptional product at a special price of $12500. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence in your field. Should you choose to accept, not only will you secure a valuable asset at an advantageous rate, but you'll also be part of our esteemed clientele. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to contribute to your success. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
